ygData.subject: Re: Stupid Names (was Gnome Kabobs) (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: No Offense taken....i have seen alot of really bad names, but I picked mine for an actual roleplaying purpose (which seems to be unique enough on its own).  I
ygData.messageBody:
No Offense taken....i have seen alot of really bad names, but I picked mine for
an actual roleplaying purpose (which seems to be unique enough on its own). I
modeled Glyphed as the "Anti-Bard" (no offense guys, i still like my bard
better). I wrote a brief history on Glyphed...it can be found at:

www.wrathofdragonclaw.org
(you have to scroll down the left frame to the bottom, and then click on the
"Glyphed" button)

I figured since Mistmoore and League of Antonican Bards were factions in
opposition, it was actually an opportunity to roleplay something in my
patterned disjointed and goofy way.

some of the goofy names that i have seen on Prexus:
Kittka t'bar (actually a guildmate)
Tommy Hillfinger (which has been changed by gms)
Buffysommers (don't know if she has a surname....DE necro btw)

one that i liked was

Xtra Large (troll warrior i think)

but i am sure everyone has a ton of names they have seen like this

Kaleid
23rd Song Half Elf Bard
Glyphed Aegiss
27th Level Dark Elf Magician
<Wave of the Dark Tide>
Prexus

>I'm suprised verant lets you keep that name, but then again, despite the so
>called rules on character names I have seen a lot of stupid player names
>(not saying yours is stupid).

>I *almost* reported a pc one afternoon at the bazaar on E'ci - I was
>auctioning a couple of black pearls at the tunnel and got a tell from an
>enchanter named "Balonie" who said to come meet her by the first inn. I ran
>over and when I got close to her I saw that her last name was "Sandwych" -
>and this was no newbie either. It kind of ticked me off at first but I
>finally I decided not to be whistle blower and went ahead and sold the
>pearls and went about my business.

>-Faras


=====
"Thou shall not kill. Thou shall not commit
adultery. Don't eat pork."
I'm sorry, what was that last one? Don't eat pork? God has spoken. Is that the word of God or is that pigs trying to out smart everybody?"
-- Jon Stewart
